metadata.dc:author: Rio, C M
de María, C L
Molina Leguizamón, E B
metadata.dc:description: In this study we are reviewing the pathology of alcohol and commenting on those dermatological processes most closely related to chronic alcoholism. We adopted the definition of alcoholism as outlined by the WHO (World Health Organization). Also, a general brief description of the woelwide history of alcoholism was included, focusing specially on Argentina with its corresponding legislative study and statistics.
metadata.dc:title: Alcoholismo y piel.
[Alcoholism and skin].
